task.summary:
Adding logger (slf4j over log4j) - Logging on console - Saving traffic traces on file
Linking to gmail account
Parsing revolico.com info Formatting output text

Fixing bugs in message reception - Getting only the first line of input mail to avoid reply text
Unescaping html characters on output message

Following url redirect
Fixing StackOverflow page parsing
Checking that content length is less than 5 mb
